description: Globally renowned, Gunther calls himself ‘an independent Scrum Caretaker on a journey of humanizing the workplace with Scrum’. In this online session, Gunther will share what drives him in his mission. He will share signs of de-humanized workplaces, and in what way Scrum offers the anti-dote and helps us re-humanizes our workplaces. This topic builds on Gunther’s findings expressed in “Engagement is the key”
title: What it means to Humanize the Workplace - with Gunther Verheyen
